comments:
Find and update of Mylar to 0.4.10 results at restart to the following error:

Mylar Java plug-in initialization failed

Framework arguments:  -detach
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86 -detach

After installation, there is a variety of things broken, such as "Commit task context...": The chosen operation is not currently available.

Error log is showing a lots of "Could not update package explorer" with this stack trace:

I ran the update manager again and found a missing update "Focused UI".  Once applied, the stacktraces reported above seem to go away... Don't know why it didn't install at the first update!

traces.message: The activator org.eclipse.mylar.provisional.ui.MylarUiPlugin for bundle org.eclipse.mylar.ui is invalid
